name: Creatures of Myth Have Taken the Tower
name_original: Creatures of Myth Have Taken the Tower
description:
Use the Spacebar and the Left & Right Arrows to play this game.

You must climb the 10 floors of the tower, defeating powerful enemies along the way. Your actions use 6-sided dice and you can gain a new die from every foe you defeat. Can you get pass the peculiar slime? What about the buff shark-man? Climb the tower and reclaim it from the creatures of mythology.

Art, Coding, Voices, and most everything besides a free song and some stock images created and implemented by Shamantitan.

Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. Monsters inspired by Dungeons & Dragons and Hololive EN.
